Key Match Events: Kylian Mbappé scored a penalty in the 56th minute.
Robert Lewandowski scored a penalty in the 79th minute.
Ousmane Dembele won the penalty that led to France's goal.
Robert Lewandowski retook and scored his penalty after VAR confirmed Mike Maignan had come off his line.
Post-Match Reflections: France could only come second in Group D after a 1-1 draw with Poland in Dortmund.
Poland fans warmly applauded their team's effort.
French fans were unhappy with finishing second in the group.
Didier Deschamps showed belief in his team's football despite not topping the group.
Miscellaneous Highlights: VAR confirmed Mike Maignan had come off his line during Robert Lewandowski's initial penalty attempt.
France will face a tougher knockout draw after finishing second in the group.
Poland was already eliminated before this match but played for pride.
